resources.string: Nectus
I accept terms and conditions.
Please fill all the details.
Please select both avatar and username.
Launch intro activity
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO connect (dvid,time,mp,aid,email,uname,op1,op2,op3,op4,op5,op6,op7,op8,op9,op10,op11,op12)
(Do come back again and connect with more people :)
Amazing!!!
Let\'s Now Check The Status Of Your Request…
Let\'s Go!
SELECT uname,aid,email,op1,op2,op3,op4,op5,op6,op7,op8,op9,op10,op11,op12,mp,devid,allow FROM matches
That\'s All For Now ! \n You have answered all the questions, we\'ll notify you when more are added :)
Superb!!!
"Now Based On the Answers You Just Gave, Let\'s See Your Top 3 Matches…"
Okay!
All Set!!!
(That\'s all you need to get started :)
Once Your Request Is Accepted, You\'ll Be Able To Chat With The Other Person!
Let\'s Explore!!
Cnectus needs an active Internet Connection, Connect your device to Internet and Restart the app!
Please create your profile first, then visit this section!
Please Head Onto the Profile section to create your profile!
Cnectus requires the R/W permissions to work! Please restart the app and grant the requested permissions…

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS profile(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, aid INTEGER, email VARCHAR(20), uname VARCHAR(20), op1 VARCHAR(20),op2 VARCHAR(20),op3 VARCHAR(20),op4 VARCHAR(20),op5 VARCHAR(20),op6 VARCHAR(20),op7 VARCHAR(20),op8 VARCHAR(20),op9 VARCHAR(20),op10 VARCHAR(20),op11 VARCHAR(20),op12 VARCHAR(20),p1 integer,p2 integer,p3 integer,p4 integer,p5 integer,p6 integer,p7 integer,p8 integer,p9 integer,p10 integer,p11 integer,p12 integer);
